attributes.action: Call for another General Election by December 2021
attributes.additional_details: There are NI increases which will affect the poorer and younger generation. There are product shortages as a result of Brexit. The test and trace is costing £50 million a month in tax payers money. We as the electorate of all ages are paying a terrible price for these problems, and deserve a government who will not go against what they print in their manifesto
attributes.background: For Parliament to call a general election as we as the constituency who voted in the current government have broken their manifesto promises by introducing a NI increase. We as the electorate deserve a government who don’t go against their manifesto.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Call an immediate general election due to authoritarian Coronavirus measures
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596452
